taskbody.context: To install using the Windows installer:

step.cmd: Make sure that your system meets the system requirements listed above.
Validate the integrity of the downloaded file by checking it against the MD5 sum published on the download page.
Run the installer and follow the instructions in the installation program.
Presumably the way you start Oxygen and the way you enter your license is different when it is installed on a server. How is it done in these cases?Start using one of the following methods:

choices.choice: Using one of the short cuts created by the installer.
By running oxygen.batoxygenAuthor.batoxygenDeveloper.batsyncroSVNClient.bat, which is located in the install folder.

step.cmd: To license your copy of go to Help Register... and enter your license key.
